results.description: To win back his ex-girlfriend, a nerdy teen starts selling ecstasy online out of his bedroom -- and becomes one of Europe's biggest dealers.
results.title: How to Sell Drugs Online (Fast)

results.description: Ten easy steps show you how to make money from drugs, featuring a series of interviews with drug dealers, prison employees, and lobbyists arguing for tougher drug laws.
results.title: How to Make Money Selling Drugs

results.description: Success, happiness and wealth can come through aloe vera products, says Danish Kim Madsen, who has made a fortune selling the dream. But is the path to success really that simple?
results.title: Believer - How to Sell a Dream

results.description: Saddam Hussein's arsenal of "weapons of mass destruction" was George W. Bush's main justification for waging war against Iraq in 2003. After the invasion of the country, American leaders recognised that they had been mistaken, and that the Baghdad tyrant did not possess such a capability. Bush claimed it was an error and defended his good faith, denouncing the negligence of his secret services. But the brutal truth lies elsewhere: The war in Iraq was based on lies.
results.title: War of Lies: How to Sell an Invasion

results.description: Banksy’s work now reportedly changes hands for millions.  But he puts up his street art for free. Have you ever wondered  what would happen if you got your hands on one of these?  Does it mean you’ve found a winning lottery ticket or just  scraped some worthless crap off a wall?  Going up against the Art Establishment, Critics, Auction Houses,  Gallery Owners and Authentication Boards in a quest for the  elusive meal ticket, two filmmakers unwittingly gatecrash the  murky and protective world of Banksy.  “HOW TO SELL A BANKSY” raises questions of ownership,  authentication and the true value of art itself. Through all the  chaos and incompetence comes a modern-day, true-story,  crime-theft, comedy-caper.
results.title: How to Sell a Banksy

results.description: A man dwarfed by sand dunes wearing only a bathrobe answers a call that will determine the direction of his life. He must sell his car, today.
results.title: How To Sell A Car

results.description: After the sudden death of world famous Lolo Ferrari, Martin Baldauf goes on a papparazzi-ridden, whirlwind promotion tour to push new English model Ashley Bond from Manchester as her successor.
results.title: Der Generalmanager oder How to Sell a Tit Wonder

results.description: Former glamour model Alex Sim-Wise helps people sell sexy content on the subscription website OnlyFans. When OnlyFans controversially announces a plan to ban adult content, can Alex and her protégés fight to keep their livelihoods?
results.title: How to Make It on OnlyFans
